name: ef-lab
description: Entity Framework tutorial with failing-first unit tests

scripts.preinstall: command -v dotnet >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo 'WARNING: dotnet SDK not found. Run: npm run install:dotnet:help'
scripts.install:dotnet:help:
echo '
=== .NET SDK Installation ===' && echo 'Ubuntu/Debian: wget https://dot.net/v1/dotnet-install.sh && chmod +x dotnet-install.sh && ./dotnet-install.sh --channel 8.0' && echo 'Then add to PATH: export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.dotnet' && echo 'Or install via package manager: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/install/linux' && echo '===========================
'
scripts.install:dotnet:script:
wget https://dot.net/v1/dotnet-install.sh && chmod +x dotnet-install.sh && ./dotnet-install.sh --channel 8.0 && echo '
Add to your ~/.bashrc:
export DOTNET_ROOT=$HOME/.dotnet
export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.dotnet:$HOME/.dotnet/tools'
scripts.install:ef: dotnet nuget locals all --clear && dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef --version 8.0.11
scripts.install:sqlite: cd EFLab && dotnet add package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite --version 8.0.* && dotnet restore
scripts.setup: npm run check:dotnet && npm run init:project && npm run install:ef && npm run install:sqlite
scripts.check:dotnet: command -v dotnet >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'ERROR: dotnet not found. Run: npm run install:dotnet:help' && exit 1)
scripts.setup:path: echo 'export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/.dotnet/tools"' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'PATH updated. Run: source ~/.bashrc'
scripts.init:project: mkdir -p EFLab && cp .templates/EFLab.csproj EFLab/ && cp .templates/Program.cs EFLab/ && mkdir -p EFLab/Testing && cp .templates/Assert.cs EFLab/Testing/ && cp .templates/TestRunner.cs EFLab/Testing/ && dotnet restore EFLab/EFLab.csproj
scripts.clean: dotnet clean EFLab/EFLab.csproj && rm -rf EFLab/bin EFLab/obj
